tachyon.worker

Class WorkerIdRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.worker.WorkerIdRegistry

  • public final class WorkerIdRegistry
extends Object
    The single place to get, set, and update worker ID. When worker process starts in TachyonWorker, worker is temporarily lost from master, or when leader master is down in fault tolerant mode, this class will try to get a new worker ID from BlockMaster. Worker ID will only be regained in BlockMasterSync when it receives Command with type CommandType.Register from BlockMaster. This class should be the only source of current worker ID within the same worker process.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long INVALID_WORKER_ID
      The default value to initialize worker ID, the worker ID generated by master will never be the same as this value.

    • Method Summary

      Registers with BlockMaster to get a new worker ID.
      static void setWorkerIdForTesting(long workerId)
      Directly sets worker id without registering with master.

    • Method Detail

      • registerWithBlockMaster

        public static void registerWithBlockMaster(WorkerBlockMasterClient masterClient,
                           NetAddress workerAddress)
                                    throws IOException
        Registers with BlockMaster to get a new worker ID.
        Parameters:
        masterClient - the master client to be used for RPC
        workerAddress - current worker address
        Throws:
        IOException - when fails to get a new worker ID

      • getWorkerId

        public static Long getWorkerId()
        Returns:
        worker ID, 0 is invalid worker id, representing that the worker hasn't been registered with master

      • setWorkerIdForTesting

        public static void setWorkerIdForTesting(long workerId)
        Directly sets worker id without registering with master. Only for unit test.
        Parameters:
        workerId - worker ID to set
